title: Tommaso：Minecraft 携带版 Alpha 0.10.0 build 3预览版已发布
author: 北美路人
txt_content:
Bug Fixes:

The game doesn't get stuck on a black screen anymore on devices where it happened.
在所有的设备上进入游戏时候不再卡死在黑屏
The player won't spawn anymore in the air or under bedrock.
玩家不会在空中或者基岩地下重生
Fixed a graphics corruption/crash happening when starting the game with Fancy OFF and turning it on.
修复当使用高品质画质开始游戏时出现的图像损坏/崩溃
Fixed flickering terrain and water in the distance on some devices.
修复有些设备上在远处出现的闪烁的地形和水
The game doesn't freeze anymore when going to sleep.?
后台运行游戏的时候世界不再静止

正版购买链接（请支持Mojang，购买正版。）：
Android版: 
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/ap ... .mojang.minecraftpe
亚马逊应用商店: http://www.amazon.cn/mojang-mine ... ition/dp/b00992cf6w
三星应用商店: http://apps.samsung.cn/topApps/t ... ductId=000000769956

iOS版: 
App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/cn/app/ ... edition/id479516143



盗版0.10.0 build 3下载链接(破解版仅供测试尝鲜使用，请于下载后24小时内删除，使用预览版本可能有崩溃或损坏存档的风险，造成损失概不负责): 
Android: http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=20054261&uk=85115777

盗版0.9.5下载链接(破解版仅供测试尝鲜使用，请于下载后24小时内删除。): 
Android: http://pan.baidu.com/s/1jG7OYMy
iOS: http://pan.baidu.com/s/1sjnsbNZ
